p: Nine dogs had arrhythmia grades of 0 (non‐pathological). Thirteen dogs (59%) developed pathological arrhythmias (grades 1‐3). All arrhythmias were ventricular in origin. Severe complex ventricular arrhythmias (grade 3) were observed in 6 dogs (27%). All grade 3 arrhythmias persisted into day two.
